revision.text: Possibly: St. John Chrysostom, Archbishop of Constantinople, His Six Books, Concerning the Priesthood. Translated from the Greek by Henry Hollier, late Vicar of Aston in Warwickshire. (London : Printed for the Translator; and Sold by G. Strahan in Cornhill, C. Rivington in St. Paul's Church-yard, F. Gyles in Holborn, T. Woodman in Covent-Garden, C. King in Westminster-Hall, and N. Mist in Great Carter-Lane, 1728?) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2410342~S1
